Text: The Red Rock River is a roughly 70 mi river in southwestern Montana in the United States.

Text: Red Rock River (Montana):  The drainage flows north and west with its name changing to "Red Rock Creek" into the Red Rock Lakes in the middle of a wide grassy valley; the Red Rock River issues from the west side of Lower Red Rock Lake.
Triplets:<Red Rock River
5:

Text: Red Rock River (Montana):  It flows west, receiving many tributaries such as Peet Creek and Long Creek, widening into the Lima Reservoir and then passing through a canyon, which ends near Lima, Montana.
